description: Position: Head of Product Strategy (Equity + Hourly Compensation) Company: Confidential Location: Remote/Flexible About the Company: We are an emerging sports marketplace for the tennis, pickleball, and racquet sports community. Our platform connects players, coaches, enthusiasts, and businesses, offering a dynamic ecosystem of resources and experiences. Role Overview: We seek a Head of Product Strategy who can define our product vision, guide the roadmap, and ensure we deliver meaningful value. This is a hands-on leadership role offering equity and an hourly rate. Key Responsibilities: - Set Product Vision & Roadmap: Align product goals with business strategy and user needs. - User Insights & Validation: Leverage research, data, and feedback to inform product decisions and prioritize features. - Cross-Functional Leadership: Collaborate with engineering, design, marketing, and ops to execute on product plans, resolve trade-offs, and deliver high-impact releases. - Market Analysis & Differentiation: Monitor industry trends and competitors to refine product positioning and ensure long-term relevance. - Continuous Optimization: Track KPIs, analyze performance, and iterate rapidly to improve the user experience and platform value. Qualifications: - Proven product leadership experience, ideally in a marketplace or community-focused platform. - Strong analytical skills and comfort with data-driven decision-making. - Effective communicator and cross-functional collaborator. - Entrepreneurial, adaptable, and user-obsessed. - Passion for racquet sports is a plus. Compensation: Equity + hourly rate, reflecting both immediate impact and long-term growth.
title: Head of Product Strategy - Emerging Sports Marketplace

description: Experienced Fractional CFO Needed for Comprehensive Financial Management Across Personal and Business Ventures Description: We are seeking a highly skilled Fractional CFO to oversee and optimize financial management across multiple areas, including a house construction project, two growing businesses, and personal financial planning. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in construction financing, small business optimization, and personal wealth management. Scope of Work Construction Financing: -Analyze current progress on a house build project and identify financial gaps. -Develop a comprehensive budget and timeline for completion. -Manage construction loan draws and determine capital contribution needs, and timing. -Advise on cash flow management and expense forecasting. Small Business Optimization: Description: We are seeking a highly skilled Fractional CFO to oversee and optimize financial management across multiple areas, including a house construction project, two growing businesses, and personal financial planning. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in construction financing, small business optimization, and personal wealth management. Scope of Work Construction Financing: -Analyze current progress on a house build project and identify financial gaps. -Develop a comprehensive budget and timeline for completion. -Manage construction loan draws and determine capital contribution needs. -Advise on cash flow management and expense forecasting. Small Business Optimization: Small Business #1: -Review and analyze current financials to identify inefficiencies and waste. -Develop strategies to improve profitability and streamline operations. -Establish growth, savings, and investment goals. Small Business #2: (late stage start-up) -Set up and organize financial books for a new distribution-focused business. -Establish realistic financial goals and profitability targets. -Provide strategies and modeling to scale operations efficiently. Personal Financial Planning: -Integrate business finances into personal wealth management. -Create a financial roadmap for retirement, investment income, and long-term stability. -Develop an investment plan to generate additional income. General Financial Management: -Provide holistic oversight of personal and business financials. -Offer monthly/quarterly reporting and actionable insights to ensure all goals are on track. -Collaborate on tax strategies and ensure compliance across all ventures. Key Qualifications -Construction financing and loan distribution -management. -Small business financial analysis and operational optimization. -Personal financial planning and wealth management. -Strong knowledge of accounting software and tools (e.g., QuickBooks, Xero). -CPA, CFA, or CFP certification is preferred, as is an MS in Finance, or related discipline. -Exceptional communication and analytical skills. -Familiarity with financial challenges faced by family-owned businesses is a plus. What We’re Looking For -A proactive and strategic thinker who can manage diverse financial needs. -Someone who can simplify complex financial concepts into actionable strategies. -Availability for regular check-ins and updates via Zoom or other platforms. -Experience working with construction projects and small business owners is essential. - Experience in CPG distribution focused company as well. This is a long-term relationship opportunity with an initial focus on the house build and subsequent business optimization. Competitive compensation based on experience and results delivered. If you have the experience and expertise to help manage and grow a financial ecosystem effectively, I would love to hear from you. Please include examples of similar projects you’ve worked on and outline how you can add value to my unique combination of ventures.
title: Experienced Fractional CFO Needed for Comprehensive Financial Management Across Personal & Business

description: 1 to 2 DAY JOB IN SAN DIEGO, CA Lightspeed is a start up that is leveraging robotics and AI to build homes. We are seeking a creative Videographer to help us film one to two days at our construction site in San Diego. The ideal candidate will be responsible for capturing high-quality video content that aligns with our brand's vision and storytelling goals. Duties Operate video cameras and other equipment during shoots to capture high-quality footage. Conduct interviews and gather b-roll footage as needed for various projects. Edit video content using software such as Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro, and other tools within the Adobe Creative Suite. Implement post-production techniques including color correction, sound editing, and visual effects using Adobe After Effects. Maintain an organized library of video files and assets for easy access by the team. Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in videography and video production. Experience Proficiency in video production techniques, including shooting, lighting, and sound recording. Strong skills in post-production editing using Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro, or similar software. Familiarity with Adobe After Effects for motion graphics and visual effects. Experience with photography is a plus, enhancing the overall visual storytelling capabilities. Knowledge of Adobe Illustrator is beneficial for creating graphics that may be incorporated into videos. A portfolio showcasing previous videography work is highly desirable. We encourage passionate individuals who are eager to contribute their creativity and technical skills to apply for this exciting opportunity. Job Types: Contract, Freelance Pay: $25.00 - $45.00 per hour Schedule: 8 hour shift Experience: Filming: 1 year (Preferred) Ability to Commute: San Diego, CA 92167 (Preferred) Ability to Relocate: San Diego, CA 92167: Relocate before starting work (Required) Work Location: In person
title: Videographer in SAN DIEGO

description: We’re seeking an experienced developer (or team) to build an AI-powered software tool that streamlines the grant application process. The tool will allow users to discover relevant grants, write proposals using AI assistance, and manage deadlines. Responsibilities: Develop a grant search feature integrated with APIs (e.g., Grants.gov) or web scraping tools. Implement AI models (e.g., GPT, OpenAI API) to generate grant proposals tailored to user input. Design a user-friendly web interface for search, editing, and tracking applications. Ensure seamless backend/frontend integration. Deploy the software on a cloud platform (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud). Requirements: Proven experience in AI/ML development (preferably NLP applications). Strong proficiency in Python (TensorFlow, PyTorch, or OpenAI APIs). Backend development skills (Flask, Django, or Node.js). Frontend expertise in React.js, Vue.js, or Angular. Familiarity with web scraping tools (e.g., BeautifulSoup, Scrapy) and API integration. Experience with cloud deployment and scalability solutions. Preferred Skills: Knowledge of grant or nonprofit industries. Experience building SaaS platforms. Budget/Compensation: [Specify your budget range or "Open to discussion."] How to Apply: Share your portfolio or GitHub link. Describe a similar project you’ve worked on and your role in it. Include your availability and expected compensation. Step 2: Posting the Job Post this job on platforms like: Upwork, Freelancer: For freelancers or small teams. LinkedIn, AngelList: For individual professionals or full-time hires. Toptal, Fiverr: For pre-vetted experts or specialized tasks. Step 3: Interview Process Here’s a step-by-step interview plan: 1. Initial Screening (15-20 minutes) Objective: Assess their understanding of your project and check for alignment. Questions to Ask: What interests you about this project? Can you describe your experience with similar tools or AI-based solutions? Do you have examples of projects with AI model integration? 2. Technical Assessment (1-2 hours) Objective: Evaluate their technical skills. Tasks: For AI Models: Ask them to build a simple text generation or classification model using GPT. For APIs/Web Scraping: Have them write code to scrape data from a sample grant page. 3. Deep Dive Interview (30-60 minutes) Objective: Understand their problem-solving approach and collaboration style. Questions to Ask: How would you approach building the grant-writing tool? What challenges do you foresee, and how would you solve them? Can you explain a time when you worked with a tight deadline or complex requirements? 4. Portfolio/Code Review Review their past work on GitHub or other platforms. Look for clean, documented, and scalable code. Step 4: Finalizing the Hire Contract: Draft a clear contract with milestones, deliverables, and payment terms. Tools for Collaboration: Project Management: Trello, Asana, or Jira. Code Collaboration: GitHub or GitLab. Communication: Slack, Zoom.
title: Credit repair/ grant writer ai tool

description: I am looking for a skilled individual who can handle documentation of multiple projects, including but not limited to user guides, process diagrams, use cases, case studies, blog content, social media content, system requirements, marketing content, graphic design, and general project documentation. Projects and content are almost exclusively Salesforce-based, so you MUST have experience with Salesforce and understand and translate complex system requirements into detailed and precise documentation. I am not looking for AI-generated responses or for anyone who intends to leverage AI tools in lieu of relevant experience. Provide examples of your work that pertain to the abovementioned areas with your submission. Ideally, this would eventually be a full-time position for the right candidate at the right price. The candidate must have a keen eye for detail and be able to learn quickly. I do not want someone who is juggling multiple clients or has a full-time job. Deliverables must be done in a reasonable timeframe, and there may be projects that have periods of full-time workloads that can not suffer due to the candidate's availability. In your cover letter, also include your annual or monthly expectations for salary if you are considered full-time in the future. Note that this would be a flat-rate salaried position. This is a fully Remote opportunity. It will require a background check, NDA, and HIPPA-compliant policies. All example documents must be of your original work and relevant to the experience outlined in this post. As noted earlier, attention to detail is critical. If any of the aforementioned criteria are not directly answered or provided in the submission, you will not be considered for the position.
title: Experienced Technical Writer for multiple Salesforce Projects

description: We are seeking a reliable and organized office administrator to support our small building company. The ideal candidate will manage day-to-day administrative tasks, assist in scheduling, maintain records, and ensure smooth office operations. Strong communication skills and attention to detail are essential. Experience in the construction industry is a plus, but not mandatory. If you are proactive and can multitask effectively in a dynamic environment, we would love to hear from you! Position Summary: 1. Project Support: - Provide administrative assistance to the Project Manager and Superintendent for project-related tasks. - Prepare, issue, and manage subcontracts while ensuring proper documentation. 2. Billing and Cost Administration: - Prepare and process billings for subcontractors and owners. - Accurately input cost and billing data into the accounting system (Infor). 3. Document and File Management: - Maintain well-organized physical and digital project files. - Ensure all documents are digitized and properly archived. 4. Change order Management: - Collaborate with the Project Manager on change order processes and related updates. 5. ;System Coordination: - Ensure synchronization between jobsite management software (e.g., Procore) and the accounting system. 6. Meeting Support: - Assist in scheduling, preparing materials, and setting up for project meetings. 7. Vendor and Subcontractor Coordination: - Distribute payments to subcontractors and vendors. - Manage compliance processes for Notices to Owner (NTO), lien waivers, and Notices of Commencement (NOC). 8. Jobsite Operations: - Oversee jobsite utilities, connectivity, cleaning services, supplies, and related payments. 9. Closeout and Warranty Management: - Support the Project Manager in managing project closeout activities and warranty processes.

description: What we are looking for: Individual proficient in the following programs and software pertaining to the upkeep and management of persistent data for our IOS and Android phone application. Also able to assist, when needed, with various simple technological issues around the office such as backup disk drives, in house POS systems, managing our website, Claris FileMaker, MacOS, etc. Company App Information: • Dart • Flutter 3.19 • Firebase- Cloud Firestore • GitHub More Specifically Pertaining to the App: We are looking for someone who can regularly updates and maintains flutter apps. Our previous developer is leaving. The current code is all there, it does have a dependency that you’ll need to add into your GitHub account to get it to work. Current build is in Flutter 3.19 but since recent XCode update - code no longer compiles in XCode. We do both iOS and Android - so will need the maintenance, code compiles, uploads etc. Some of the errors we are seeing: • No member named 'memory_order_relaxed' in 'std::memory_order'; did you mean 'std::memory_order_relaxed'? • The iOS deployment target 'IPHONEOS_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET' is set to 11.0, but the range of supported deployment target versions is 12.0 to 18.1.99. (in target 'url_launcher_ios-url_launcher_ios_privacy' from project 'Pods') Who we are: We are a small, local business specializing in medical weight loss. We have two locations in San Diego, California.

We look forward to working with someone passionate about keeping our finances brewing smoothly.

description: Hello! We’re Precise Mind Behavioral Health, and we’re thrilled to find a motivated, organized, and people-focused professional to join our team as a Client Engagement & Lead Management Specialist. This role is all about connecting with new clients, guiding them through their onboarding journey, and ensuring they feel supported from their first contact with us. If you’re passionate about helping people, have a knack for organization, and enjoy working independently with a friendly, client-centered team, we’d love to meet you! Here's a bit more about what the role involves and how we like to work together. Expectations: Task Deliverables: Your main tasks include managing new client leads by verifying and entering information, scheduling consultations, following up with leads, and maintaining accurate records in Therapy Notes. You’ll also handle daily email management and assist with various administrative tasks to support a seamless client experience. Timely Follow-Ups: Follow-up calls, emails, and automated messages should be conducted within specific time frames, and all client information should be updated promptly in the onboarding spreadsheet. Accuracy and Confidentiality: It’s crucial to handle client information accurately and in compliance with HIPAA standards, ensuring confidentiality at all times. Skills Required: Customer Service: Strong interpersonal and communication skills, especially on phone calls and in follow-up messages. Sales: Ability to use sales techniques to encourage leads to book consultations or appointments. Data Management: Proficiency in Therapy Notes, Google Sheets, and HIPAA-compliant email platforms. Organization: Strong organizational skills to keep track of multiple clients at different stages. Tech Savvy: Familiarity with automation tools (e.g., Zapier) and calendar/scheduling software. Communication: Daily Updates: We expect clear daily updates on lead statuses and task progress through email or a shared project management tool. Check-Ins: During daily check-in times, report any issues or questions that arise. We're available for quick questions throughout the day via email or messaging. Response Time: Aim to respond to team messages and client inquiries within an hour during business hours. Our Workflow: Independent Work: We value independent work and trust our team to manage tasks efficiently with minimal oversight. Structured Daily Schedule: Your day will be divided into check-in sessions for lead monitoring and data entry (e.g., 9:30 AM, 12:00 PM, 3:00 PM, 5:30 PM). Central Time Zone Clear Processes: Detailed guidelines and workflows are provided for each stage of the lead management process. Our team uses Therapy Notes and Google Sheets extensively, so familiarity with these platforms is ideal. Team Meetings: Regular check-ins are held weekly for updates, feedback, and discussing any adjustments needed in the workflow. This setup ensures a streamlined client experience, making the onboarding process efficient and organized. If you’re detail-oriented, communicative, and comfortable working in a structured, independent role, we’d love to have you on our team!
title: Client Engagement & Lead Management Specialist for Telehealth Practice

title: Apache Superset Dashboard Development

description: Project Overview: We are seeking a skilled Python developer to integrate an existing idiCORE API into an Apache Airflow 2.10.2 orchestrated ETL pipeline. The successful candidate will design, develop, and deploy the integration, ensuring seamless data flow between the idiCORE API, Postgres databases, and Odoo CRM. 1. Responsibilities API Integration: - Integrate the idiCORE API into the existing Airflow pipeline using Python. - Handle API calls to populate database fields with contact information for individuals based on name, address, and/or phone number. Data Transformation: - Utilize Pydantic and SQLAlchemy to transform data from the idiCORE API response into a format suitable for storage in the Odoo CRM Postgres database. Database Integration: - Ensure data is stored correctly in the Odoo CRM Postgres database using SQLAlchemy. Error Handling and Logging: - Implement robust error handling mechanisms to handle any issues that may arise during API calls or data transformation. - Configure logging to track pipeline performance and errors. Security and Authentication: - Ensure proper authentication and authorization mechanisms are in place for the idiCORE API integration. Testing and Quality Assurance: - Develop comprehensive test cases to validate the integration's functionality and performance. 2. Requirements Technical Skills: - Proficiency in Python (3.x) and familiarity with Airflow 2.10.2. - Experience with Postgres, Pydantic, SQLAlchemy, and Odoo CRM. - Knowledge of idiCORE API and its requirements (nice-to-have). Experience: - Previous experience with ETL pipelines, data integration, and API integrations. Soft Skills: - Strong understanding of software development principles, best practices, and design patterns. - Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to work in a fast-paced environment. 3. Deliverables - A fully functional, tested, and documented integration of the idiCORE API into the Airflow pipeline. - A comprehensive understanding of the project's architecture, data flows, and security measures. - A detailed report outlining any issues encountered during development, testing, or deployment. 4. Timeline The current expected completion date is January 1st, 2025. However, we may alter the project timeline based on changes in scope, complexity, and available resources. 5. Evaluation Criteria - Technical proficiency and expertise. - Quality of code, documentation, and overall project delivery. - Adherence to project requirements, timelines, and security guidelines.
title: Integrate idiCORE API into Apache Airflow orchestrated ETL pipeline

description: Job Description: We are seeking a dynamic and self-motivated Remote Sales Representative to join our team as the first dedicated sales professional. This individual will play a pivotal role in driving revenue growth by taking ownership of all sales-related activities, from lead generation to closing deals. As a proactive go-getter, the ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and executing a comprehensive sales strategy, identifying new business opportunities, and building relationships with prospective clients. Responsibilities: • Develop and implement a comprehensive sales strategy to drive revenue growth and meet sales targets. • Generate and qualify leads through research, outreach, and networking. • Build and manage a pipeline of prospective clients, identifying key decision-makers and stakeholders. • Conduct outbound sales activities, including cold calling, email outreach, and social media engagement. • Present and demonstrate the company’s products/services to prospective clients, highlighting value and benefits. • Manage the entire sales cycle, from initial contact to negotiation and contract closure. • Collaborate with internal teams to ensure smooth onboarding and client satisfaction. • Track and report on sales activities, performance metrics, and revenue forecasts. • Stay up to date with industry trends and market developments to identify new opportunities. • Provide feedback to leadership on market needs and potential product enhancements. Qualifications: • Proven experience in a sales role, preferably in a startup or small team environment. • Demonstrated ability to generate leads, build a sales pipeline, and close deals independently. • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with a talent for building relationships. • Self-motivated, results-driven, and comfortable working in a remote environment. • Strong organizational and time-management skills to manage multiple priorities effectively. • Proficiency with CRM software, sales automation tools, and communication platforms. • Experience in cold calling, email campaigns, and other outreach methods. • Familiarity with the industry or target market is a plus but not required. Benefits: • Competitive base salary with performance-based commissions. • Flexible, fully remote work environment. Opportunity to grow with the company and shape the sales function. • Direct impact on company growth and success. • Possible stock options This position offers a unique opportunity to build and lead the sales function from the ground up. If you are a driven sales professional ready to take on the challenge of generating new business and driving revenue growth, we want to hear from you!
title: Remote Sales Representative For Software Startup

description: We are looking for a talented Full Stack Developer with expertise in Ruby, Python, React, Redux, and AWS to collaborate on an exciting project. This role is ideal for a freelancer with a proven track record of developing scalable and user-friendly web applications. You'll work closely with our team to design, develop, and deploy high-quality software that meets both technical and business requirements. Key Responsibilities: Develop and maintain robust server-side applications using Ruby (Rails preferred) and Python. Build dynamic and responsive front-end interfaces using React and Redux. Design, implement, and optimize APIs for seamless integration between front-end and back-end systems. Manage and deploy cloud-based solutions on AWS, leveraging services such as EC2, S3, Lambda, and RDS. Collaborate with team members to troubleshoot and resolve technical challenges. Deliver clean, maintainable, and well-documented code within project deadlines. Requirements: Strong experience in Ruby on Rails and Python development. Proficiency in building front-end applications using React and Redux. Solid understanding of AWS cloud architecture and hands-on experience deploying applications in a cloud environment. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to debug complex technical issues. Familiarity with version control systems (Git) and collaborative workflows. Experience with Agile development practices is a plus. Scope: The project involves the development of a robust authorization module for a Medicare system. This module will ensure secure access control for users, providing role-based and permission-based authentication. Key functionalities include: User registration and login with multi-factor authentication. Role-based access control (RBAC) for healthcare providers, administrators, and patients. Integration with an existing Medicare database for seamless user management. Session management with token-based authentication (e.g., OAuth2/JWT). Logging and monitoring of user activities for security compliance. Implementation of industry-standard security practices (e.g., HIPAA compliance). Communication: Daily collaboration and queries through Skype.
title: Full Stack Developer (Ruby, Python, React, Redux, AWS)

description: Full-Stack Software / Cloud Engineer Job title: Full-Stack Software / Cloud Engineer Location: US-Remote, No Travel Terms: Contract, 8-12 Hours per Week Requirements: Strong experience in scripting, modern container solutions, and Cloud DevOps; GitHub; AWS Cloud Services, Docker, Data Storage, Information Security, Python, and Streamlit About us: DNA Analytics is looking to revolutionize the drug discovery process as it continues to develop, optimize, and expand its software platform's AI prediction capabilities in genomics. About the role: We are looking for a hands-on, full-stack software engineer/cloud engineer on a project basis to drive the design and development of our world-class cloud software platform. The candidate will collaborate directly with the CEO, the product leadership team, and a lean technical team. Responsibilities: • Full-stack software design and development • Platform architecture • Coding, testing, and execution • Software quality testing, troubleshooting, and bug fixes • Participation in project planning, task assignment, time estimates, and delivery date identification • Coordinating with a team of 5 scientific developers in development planning, delivery, code review, and more Candidate requirements: • US-based (Eastern Time preferred but not required) • Native English speaking skills • Full-stack software, cloud, and container experience • Proven history of setting and meeting delivery deadlines • Strong knowledge of GitHub, AWS Services, Docker, Python, Streamlit, Data Storage, Information and Application Security, Cloud DevOps, Container Services Contact us to apply Are you excited to help optimize health outcomes by transforming the drug discovery process? Contact our CEO, Raymond J. Peterson, PhD, directly to set up an interview today.
title: Full-Stack Software / Cloud Engineeer

description: We are a small ISP and have 7 different systems that we use to manage the network. I've struggled with getting the authentication working properly. In one case, the client credentials workflow does not update the OAUTH2_TOKEN placeholder in the query. I can probably accomplish this with a custom workflow, but as I understand it, you cannot use those in workflows. This is foundational stuff for a tool that is supposed to allow you to write middleware via APIs, but I don't have the time to spend fighting with it. Once all of these APIs are authenticated and working, the first functionality I'd like to implement is to iterate through a list from one systems and make updates in another via a button. Secondly, a working example of a webhook to fire when events happen in the CRM. I think armed with this, I can begin creating useful functionality, but I'd like to have a resource I can depend on should I get in a bind. I have a background in software development as I used to own a software company, but that was about 10 years ago.
title: Initial setup for Retool internal application

description: Senior .NET Developer with Azure experience Location Baltimore, Maryland Categories .NET, Azure cloud Employment type 1099, 6 months contract with a possibility to extend Travel requirements Occasional Ability to obtain clearance N/A Remote Mostly As a Senior .NET Developer with Azure experience, you will use cloud and technical architecture expertise to help our clients solve challenging problems through innovative technology solutions. Work on exciting projects, future-proof your skills, and grow into your dream job alongside some of the most talented, knowledgeable, and dedicated technologists in the industry. What You'll Be Doing Lead client interaction to gather business requirements and develop concepts of operations. Automate processes, develop proof of concepts, develop and enhance prototypes, create production applications. Assist in in selecting the appropriate cloud architecture and products patterns Support business development activities, including presentations, proposals, white papers, blog postings, and proof of concepts (POCs) Work closely with cloud-native application architectures (PaaS, IaaS, microservices, containerization, serverless computing, API design, and Infrastructure as Code) Assess and recommend new technology/solutions. Clearly communicate (written and orally) technical issues and solutions to non-technical staff. Location and Travel Details This is a remote position with occasional travel. Profile of Success Over 5+ years of experience with .NET technologies (C#, ASP.NET, ASP.NET MVC), front end web development (JavaScript frameworks, Angular 10+ is a plus) and databases (SQL, NoSQL) to develop software solutions Experience with clean architecture, SOLID development methodologies and agile processes (Scaled Agile Framework is preferred) Experience with distributed systems (microservices, SOA, REST, ESB) and general industry-specific design principles and frameworks with a background with PowerShell scripting Understanding of cloud architecture principles and patterns Experience leading members of a development team Experience designing, implementing and documenting scalable and highly available solutions on a public cloud (Azure or AWS) Ability and desire to keep up with changing industry trends Desirable Skills Automate and script repetitive tasks Automate and script repetitive tasks Understanding of design patterns in C# Previous experience with Entity Framework (EF Core 6 is a plus) Previous exposure to CI/CD processes using tools like PowerShell and Azure DevOps Understanding of DevOps practices and automation tools
title: Senior .NET Developer with Azure experience

description: Location: Remote (USA-Based Only) Position Type: Independent Contractor Are you a driven, results-oriented professional with a talent for identifying and engaging top prospects? We are seeking an Aggressive Appointment Setter to join our team as an independent contractor, helping to connect qualified leads to our high-ticket fashion design and business coaching program. About Us: Our coaching program empowers aspiring and emerging fashion designers to build, launch, and scale profitable fashion brands. Through expert guidance and support, we transform creative entrepreneurs into successful business owners. Responsibilities: Lead Outreach: Proactively engage potential clients through: Phone calls Instagram Direct Messages Follow-ups on program applications Appointment Setting: Secure qualified appointments with a 40% setting close rate, using persistence and strategic follow-up methods. Lead Qualification: Apply the 80/20 rule to ensure focus on high-quality, qualified leads. CRM Management: Use CRM software to communicate with and manage prospects, maintaining up-to-date records on all interactions. Follow-Up Strategy: Aggressively follow up with prospects to nurture interest and drive conversions. Qualifications: USA-Based Only – Must reside in the United States. Proven experience in appointment setting, sales, or lead generation. Proficiency in using CRM tools to track and manage communications. Strong communication skills (written and verbal), with a professional and engaging demeanor. Comfortable initiating conversations via phone and social media platforms. Results-driven with a passion for exceeding goals and closing leads. Why Join Us? Work with a dynamic and innovative team in the fashion industry. Flexible remote work arrangement. Performance-based incentives and the opportunity to make a significant impact.
title: Aggressive Appointment Setter

description: We are seeking a skilled PC support technician to assist with various computer issues. The ideal candidate will have experience in diagnosing and repairing hardware and software problems. You will provide remote support, troubleshoot issues, and ensure optimal performance of our computer systems. Strong communication skills and a customer-oriented approach are essential. If you have a passion for technology and problem-solving, we want to hear from you!
title: PC Support and Computer Repair Specialist Needed

description: ‘Seeking a short consult about a software testing project. The software operates a large complex machine, and includes four components: Python for comm & data transfer, C++ for processing, React for UX, and Linux for OS. The software is written, and localized Unit testing has been completed. All the software has now been installed on the big machine for Verification testing, so the software components now operate as an integrated system. My question focuses on observability. How does a ‘tester’ (a software engineer) evaluate the individual software components on the machine, determine that they’re working properly, w accurate outputs. The need is to evaluate the interactions between integrated components to verify overall system behavior. Assume complete physical access to everything--- unit test files, code base, etc. (note, the machine is not networked to cloud or anything,) I understand there are tools to monitor and visualize these operations discretely, with some granularity. Or maybe there are other ways? I need to know how to do this. Do you have any experience w this? Have you designed or run tests of integrated systems, with multiple software components? We can chat briefly, or go by email. I just need a detailed understanding of how this can be done.
title: Enterprise Software Testing - Need Short Consult

title: USB Driver for Medical Imaging X-ray Device, TWAIN Driver.

description: MBM DJs & Events, a growing DJ and events company specializing in weddings, corporate events, and private gatherings, is seeking a detail-oriented Remote Bookkeeper to join our team. You will play a key role in ensuring the financial health and organization of our business. This is a part-time, remote position with flexible hours, perfect for an experienced bookkeeper who thrives in a collaborative and fast-paced environment, looking for supplemental freelance projects. Responsibilities: • Manage and reconcile accounts in QuickBooks or similar accounting software. • Track income and expenses, ensuring accurate categorization and reporting. • Prepare monthly financial statements, including profit and loss reports. • Process invoices and ensure timely payments to contractors and vendors. • Monitor budgets and financial forecasts. • Maintain organized financial records and ensure compliance with tax regulations. • Collaborate with the operations team to manage event-related financial transactions. Requirements: • Proven experience as a bookkeeper, preferably in the events or service industry. • Proficiency in QuickBooks Online or similar accounting software. • Strong understanding of financial regulations and bookkeeping practices. • Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail. • Ability to work independently and meet deadlines. • Strong communication skills and a collaborative attitude. • Experience with payroll and contractor payments is a plus.
title: Bookkeeper Needed for DJ & Photo-Booth Business

description: We’re looking for an Appsmith specialist who can help our team build, refine, and deploy custom forms and interfaces for a healthcare-related project. You’ll be working closely with our existing developers and team members, contributing both hands-on technical skills and mentorship as we integrate Appsmith into our workflow. What You’ll Do: Collaborate with our team to design and implement intuitive, user-friendly forms and dashboards using Appsmith. Use your JavaScript expertise to create dynamic components and workflows. Guide and educate internal team members on best practices in Appsmith and low-code development. Contribute to an evolving hybrid environment of low-code platforms and traditional engineering tools. Potentially support future enhancements and projects, depending on performance and fit. What We’re Looking For: Strong, hands-on experience building complex interfaces in Appsmith. Solid JavaScript proficiency for custom logic, dynamic functionality, and data integrations. A keen eye for UX design, with the ability to craft clean, user-friendly interfaces. Willingness to work closely with our team, providing both execution and guidance. Familiarity with working across different platforms and frameworks (e.g., Nocodb, Next.js, Django) is a plus, but not required. Excellent communication skills and the ability to explain concepts clearly. Additional Details: We’re open to continued work beyond the initial deliverables, depending on how well we collaborate. We’re US-based and prefer candidates able to collaborate effectively with East/Central time zones. If you’re passionate about low-code solutions, excited to contribute to a meaningful project in the healthcare space, and eager to help shape our team’s approach to Appsmith, we’d love to hear from you. Please share samples of your work, your availability, and any relevant past experience.
title: Appsmith Expert

description: Job Description: We are seeking an experienced developer to create a bot or automation tool that will scrape scheduling data from our existing medical software and sync it with a more user-friendly scheduling platform. Our current medical scheduling system is difficult to navigate, particularly on mobile devices, so we need a seamless way to view and manage appointments on an alternative platform. Responsibilities: • Analyze the current medical scheduling system to identify and extract relevant data. • Develop a bot/tool to scrape scheduling information and export it to the new platform. • Ensure the data syncs in real-time (or near real-time) between both platforms. • Implement features to handle conflicts or data discrepancies during syncing. • Provide user-friendly tools or documentation for ongoing management and troubleshooting. Requirements: • Proven experience in web scraping, automation, or bot development. • Familiarity with medical scheduling systems (preferred, but not required). • Strong understanding of APIs and integration between systems. • Ability to ensure data security and compliance with HIPAA (if applicable). • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Deliverables: • A fully functional bot/tool that syncs scheduling data between systems. • Documentation and training on how to use and maintain the tool. • Ongoing support for any bugs or improvements during the initial rollout period. Preferred Skills: • Experience with healthcare or medical software systems. • Knowledge of scheduling platforms and their APIs. • Ability to design user-friendly interfaces for mobile devices.
title: Develop a Bot to Sync Medical Scheduling System with User-Friendly Platform

description: About Us: At AstralTech Labs, we specialize in delivering customized AI and software solutions that tackle real business challenges. From automating time-consuming processes to optimizing operations and enhancing decision-making, we equip businesses with the tools to boost productivity and achieve sustainable growth. Our tailored solutions turn raw data into actionable insights, cut operational costs, and proactively mitigate risks through advanced predictive analytics. Job Summary: We are looking for a skilled Software Engineer to join our team and contribute to the design, development, and deployment of custom software solutions. The ideal candidate will have experience in full-stack development, a strong grasp of best practices, and a passion for writing clean, efficient code. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver projects that exceed client expectations. Responsibilities: * Develop and maintain web and mobile applications using modern programming languages (JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Kotlin, Swift, Go, Rust, or Dart). * Write clean, scalable, and efficient code while adhering to established standards and best practices. * Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing software and suggest enhancements to optimize functionality. * Deploy, manage, and monitor applications in cloud environments, utilizing DevOps practices to streamline continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines. * Integrate AI and machine learning models into web applications. * Collaborate with QA teams to ensure high-quality software through rigorous testing, including automated testing and monitoring. * Monitor and optimize application performance, scalability, and reliability, proactively addressing any issues that arise in production. * Keep up-to-date with industry trends, technologies, and best practices to continuously improve our development process. Requirements: * Proven experience as a Software Engineer or similar role in a professional environment, preferably within a custom development agency. * Proficiency in full-stack development, including experience with any modern programming language (e.g., JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Kotlin, Swift, Go, Rust, or Dart). * Experience with modern frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js, Django, Flask, Flutter). * Strong understanding of databases, both SQL and NoSQL, and cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud). * Familiarity with RESTful APIs, third-party integrations, and microservices architecture * Experience with version control systems, particularly Git, and CI/CD pipelines. * Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and a proactive attitude. * Strong communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a collaborative environment. AstralTech Labs is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
title: Software Engineer

description: About Us: At AstralTech Labs, we specialize in delivering customized AI and software solutions that tackle real business challenges. From automating time-consuming processes to optimizing operations and enhancing decision-making, we equip businesses with the tools to boost productivity and achieve sustainable growth. Our tailored solutions turn raw data into actionable insights, cut operational costs, and proactively mitigate risks through advanced predictive analytics. Job Summary: We are looking for a skilled Backend Software Engineer to develop and maintain server-side components for custom software solutions. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in backend development, database management, and cloud infrastructure, with a focus on creating scalable, reliable, and secure applications. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver robust solutions that exceed client expectations. Responsibilities: * Develop and maintain server-side logic, ensuring scalability, reliability, and efficiency. * Design, implement, and optimize APIs (RESTful and GraphQL) for seamless integration with frontend components and third-party services. * Build and manage databases (SQL and NoSQL), ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval processes. * Deploy, monitor, and maintain backend services in cloud environments (e.g., AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud). * Implement security best practices, including authentication, authorization, and data protection. * Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize backend services to enhance performance and resolve production issues. * Collaborate with frontend engineers to define and refine API contracts and integration points. * Stay current with industry trends, technologies, and best practices in backend development to ensure modern, efficient solutions. Requirements: * Proven experience as a Backend Software Engineer or similar role in a professional environment. * Proficiency in backend development using modern programming languages (e.g., Python, Go, Rust, TypeScript, JavaScript). * Strong understanding of databases, including relational (SQL) and non-relational (NoSQL). * Experience with backend frameworks (e.g., Django, Flask, Express.js, FastAPI) and the ability to adapt to new frameworks as needed. * Experience with API development (RESTful or GraphQL) and third-party service integrations. * Familiarity with microservices architecture and containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes). * Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud) and deploying scalable applications. * Knowledge of testing frameworks (e.g., Pytest, Mocha, Jest) and the ability to write unit tests. * Knowledge of DevOps principles, including CI/CD pipelines and monitoring tools. * Understanding of security practices (e.g., OAuth, JWT, data encryption). * Excellent problem-solving skills, with a proactive attitude toward identifying and resolving issues. * Strong communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a collaborative, cross-functional environment. * A passion for continuous learning and improvement in backend development practices. AstralTech Labs is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
title: Backend Software Engineer

description: About Us: At AstralTech Labs, we specialize in delivering customized AI and software solutions that tackle real business challenges. From automating time-consuming processes to optimizing operations and enhancing decision-making, we equip businesses with the tools to boost productivity and achieve sustainable growth. Our tailored solutions turn raw data into actionable insights, cut operational costs, and proactively mitigate risks through advanced predictive analytics. Job Summary: We are seeking a talented and motivated Frontend Software Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for building and maintaining user-facing features and interfaces that deliver exceptional user experiences. You will collaborate with designers, backend engineers, and project managers to translate design ideas and functional requirements into high-quality, scalable, and performant frontend solutions. Responsibilities: * Develop, test, and maintain responsive and interactive web applications using modern frontend frameworks and libraries (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js). * Collaborate with designers and UX specialists to implement visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces that meet accessibility standards. * Work closely with backend engineers to integrate APIs and other services into the frontend application. * Optimize application performance for maximum speed and scalability across devices and browsers. * Ensure code quality through unit testing, peer reviews, and adherence to coding standards and best practices. * Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve issues reported by users or identified in testing. * Stay up-to-date with the latest technologies, trends, and best practices in frontend development to drive innovation within the team. Requirements: * Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (ES6+). * Hands-on experience with at least one modern frontend framework/library such as React, Vue.js, or Angular. * Familiarity with state management libraries (e.g., Redux, MobX, Vuex) and component-based architecture. * Experience with TypeScript for scalable and type-safe development. * Knowledge of testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Mocha, Cypress). * Familiarity with modern build tools (e.g., Webpack, Vite, Babel) and package managers (e.g., npm, Yarn). * Experience integrating RESTful APIs and working with JSON data formats. * Knowledge of browser rendering behaviors and performance optimization techniques. * Understanding of version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaborative workflows. * Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Preferred Qualifications: * Understanding of accessibility (WCAG standards) and internationalization (i18n). * Exposure to CI/CD pipelines and deployment strategies. * Familiarity with frontend performance monitoring tools and analytics. AstralTech Labs is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

description: About Us: At AstralTech Labs, we specialize in delivering customized AI and software solutions that tackle real business challenges. From automating time-consuming processes to optimizing operations and enhancing decision-making, we equip businesses with the tools to boost productivity and achieve sustainable growth. Our tailored solutions turn raw data into actionable insights, cut operational costs, and proactively mitigate risks through advanced predictive analytics. Job Summary: We are seeking an experienced Software Solution Architect to join our team and lead the design of innovative software solutions that align with our clients’ business objectives. In this role, you will work closely with sales executives to analyze requirements, create architectural blueprints, and deliver scalable, integrated solutions. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both technology and business strategy, with proven experience in designing end-to-end software solutions. Responsibilities: * Engage with account executives to understand clients’ business goals, technical needs, and project requirements. * Translate business requirements into architectural solutions, creating a strategic roadmap that ensures alignment with client objectives. * Design high-level solutions, including system architecture, integration points, data flows, and technology stacks, ensuring scalability, security, and performance. * Select and recommend appropriate technologies, frameworks, and third-party services to support the solution. * Provide technical time estimates to support project planning, ensuring accuracy and feasibility. * Produce detailed solution documentation, including system diagrams, process flows, and technical requirements for client presentations. * Communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, ensuring that the proposed solution is understood and aligned with business expectations. * Provide ongoing support throughout the project lifecycle, working with development teams to address any architectural challenges. * Conduct regular reviews of implemented solutions to ensure consistency with architectural plans and client requirements. Requirements: * Proven experience in solution architecture or a related role within a software development or consulting environment. * Strong proficiency in architectural design patterns, microservices, cloud computing (e.g., AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud), and enterprise integration. * Experience with modern programming languages and frameworks (e.g., JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Kotlin, Swift, Go, Rust, Dart, React, Angular, Vue.js, Django, Flask, Flutter). * Solid understanding of system integration, including APIs, middleware, data flows, and third-party services. * Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey complex technical information to both technical and non-technical audiences. * Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail, with a proactive approach to identifying and mitigating potential risks. Preferred Qualifications: * Experience with AI/ML model integration and data-driven solutions. * Knowledge of DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure-as-code tools. * Previous experience in a custom software development agency or consulting environment. AstralTech Labs is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

description: I run a software company specializing in advanced AI solutions and scalable software development. We are embarking on an internal marketing project called Nova, where we are leveraging advanced AWS tools like Bedrock to create innovative software features. To showcase this, we want to create a high-quality weekly video series that highlights our software developers as they build features for Nova. The goal of this series is to: 1. Attract high-quality, larger clients to our business. 2. Increase social media engagement and expand our content presence. 3. Demonstrate our technical capabilities through engaging and polished content. We will provide screen recordings of the development process and need you to transform them into engaging weekly episodes, blog content, and social media posts across platforms like LinkedIn, Twitter, and YouTube. What We’re Looking For: • Video Editing Expertise: Ability to take raw screen recordings and turn them into polished, professional weekly videos. • Social Media Savvy: Experience creating strategic content to engage audiences and attract high-quality clients. • Portfolio of Success: Show us your past work with examples of big-name clients or successful campaigns that drove new business. • Strategic Content Planning: Ability to develop a weekly content calendar that includes videos, blog posts, and social media posts. • Marketing Focus: Understanding of how to position technical content to appeal to potential clients, especially medium-to-large businesses. Project Scope: • Weekly Deliverables: • One high-quality edited video per week. • Coordinated blog post or social media captions that align with each video. • Scheduling and publishing content across multiple platforms. Requirements: • Based in the United States. • Proven experience in video editing and social media strategy. • Track record of attracting high-value clients through content. • Ability to work collaboratively and independently. When Applying: Please include: 1. Your portfolio showcasing relevant work. 2. Examples of high-profile clients you’ve worked with. 3. A brief description of how you’d approach this project. We’re excited to build something engaging and impactful — let’s create content that showcases great software and brings in amazing clients!
title: Seeking US-Based Video Editor & Social Media Expert to Attract High-Quality Clients for Software

description: Project Overview: We are looking for a full stack software engineer to contribute to an exciting project within the grant project. This could be an excellent opportunity for experienced professionals looking for an additional project to contribute to women's health, or for advanced students with strong technical skills. Upon receipt of the grant, you will work on developing our HIPAA-compliant digital health platform for physicians, focusing on maternal's health management and personalized care delivery. Important Note: Per grant requirements, candidates must be located in New Jersey, USA. Project Scope: Development of a secure, HIPAA-compliant web application for physicians that includes: • Patient data management dashboard • Genetic test results visualization • Personalized health recommendations interface • Care plan management tools • Secure communication features • Integration with existing genetics reporting system Technical Requirements Frontend: • React.js (core requirement) • TypeScript • Redux or Context API for state management • Material UI or Tailwind CSS • Jest and React Testing Library Backend: • Node.js with Express.js OR Python with Flask/FastAPI • RESTful API development • JWT authentication • Secure session management • HIPAA-compliant data handling Database: • PostgreSQL • Redis (for session management and caching) Infrastructure: • AWS or GCP cloud services • Docker containerization • HIPAA-compliant hosting • CI/CD pipeline experience Security: • SSL/TLS implementation • Data encryption (at rest and in transit) • Role-based access control (RBAC) • Audit logging • HIPAA security compliance Required Qualifications • 3+ years of experience as a full stack software engineer OR equivalent advanced technical project experience • Technical undergraduate degree or equivalent work experience • Experience with secure healthcare data handling is a big plus • Strong communication skills, both written and verbal Highly Valued • Prior healthcare application development experience desired • Understanding of healthcare data security requirements • Experience with patient portal development • Interest in women's health technology This is an opportunity to: • Build technology that improves women's healthcare delivery • Work on innovative digital health solutions • Be part of a growing women's health platform Flexibility • Project-based work • Suitable as an additional project for experienced professionals • Open to advanced students with strong technical capabilities • Must be located in New Jersey, USA (grant requirement)
title: Full Stack Software Engineer - Women's Health Digital Platform, NJ-based

description: Hello, Our Content Creator Management Agency is looking for a Financial Manager who can help with the following - put together monthly reports for each client's P&L - Assist with Payroll - Maintain financial records and monthly P&L - Assist with Financial Analysis Below is a more in depth job description please share your relevant experience when applying Reports To: Founder About Us: Model Starz is a leading marketing agency specializing in innovative strategies and creative solutions for our diverse client base. Our team is passionate about driving results and delivering exceptional value to our clients. We are seeking a skilled Financial Manager to join our dynamic team and oversee the financial health and growth of our agency. Job Overview: As the Financial Manager at Model Starz, you will play a pivotal role in managing the agency’s financial operations, including budgeting, forecasting, financial reporting, and compliance. You will work closely with the Founder to develop financial strategies that support the agency’s growth objectives and ensure the efficient allocation of resources. Your expertise will be essential in optimizing financial performance and providing insights that guide decision-making. Key Responsibilities: Financial Planning & Analysis: Develop and manage the agency’s annual budget, including revenue projections, expense planning, and cash flow management. Financial Reporting: Prepare and present monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports to Founder, providing insights and recommendations based on financial data. Cost Management: Monitor and control costs across departments, ensuring efficient use of resources and alignment with budgetary goals. Revenue Management: Analyze revenue streams, client profitability, and project margins to identify opportunities for growth and optimization. Compliance & Risk Management: Ensure compliance with all financial regulations, tax requirements, and internal policies. Identify and manage financial risks, implementing mitigation strategies as needed. Payroll & Invoicing: Oversee the payroll process, ensuring accuracy and timely payments. Manage invoicing and accounts receivable to maintain healthy cash flow. Financial Strategy: Collaborate with senior management to develop financial strategies that support the agency’s long-term objectives and business development efforts. Audit Coordination: Lead the preparation for internal and external audits, ensuring all financial records are accurate and up to date. Vendor & Client Relations: Manage financial relationships with vendors, clients, and other stakeholders, including contract negotiations and payment terms. Team Leadership: Lead and mentor a small finance team, providing guidance and support to ensure high performance and professional growth. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field. A Master’s degree or professional certification (e.g., CPA, CFA) is preferred. 5+ years of experience in financial management, preferably within a marketing or creative agency. Strong knowledge of financial principles, accounting standards, and financial regulations. Proficiency in financial management software (e.g., QuickBooks, Xero, Excel) and reporting tools. Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen eye for detail. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to present financial information clearly and concisely. Experience in budgeting, forecasting, and financial modeling. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities simultaneously. Preferred Qualifications: Experience in a marketing or creative agency environment. Knowledge of project-based accounting and client billing processes. Familiarity with digital marketing metrics and their financial implications. What We Offer: Competitive salary and benefits package. A collaborative and creative work environment. Opportunities for professional development and career advancement. Flexible work arrangements.
title: Finance Manager

description: Information Security Leadership Collaborate with the CSO or designated committee to implement cybersecurity policies, strategies, and best practices across the organization. Assist in defining and documenting clear security responsibilities, including succession plans for the CSO role. Vendor Security Risk Management (VSRM) Develop and oversee a Vendor Security Risk Management (VSRM) program, including: Evaluating vendor criticality and risk. Establishing vendor monitoring and compliance review processes. Ensuring vendors meet ThriveLink’s security and regulatory requirements. Work closely with vendors and subcontractors to ensure secure data handling practices. Phishing Tests and Security Awareness Implement regular phishing simulations for employees and contractors to enhance security awareness. Support the delivery of security training programs, including tracking training completion and identifying improvement areas. Cyber Liability Insurance Collaborate with leadership to evaluate and secure cyber liability insurance coverage. Assist in maintaining documentation related to insurance policies and claims. Secure Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) Formalize and document a Secure SDLC process, ensuring it includes: Threat modeling. Secure coding standards. Code review practices. Collaborate with the development team to integrate security into all stages of the SDLC. Secure Code Scanning Implement routine secure code scanning and remediation practices to identify and address vulnerabilities. Ensure all code changes undergo security reviews before deployment. Customer-Facing Security Documentation Create and maintain customer-facing security documentation that provides clear instructions on product security settings, configurations, and implementation best practices. Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) Develop and maintain a comprehensive Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) for all ThriveLink products to track third-party components and dependencies. Cloud Security Tools and Services Ensure the effective use of AWS native tools and third-party services to secure ThriveLink's cloud environment. Manage the implementation and monitoring of tools such as AWS CloudTrail, GuardDuty, and IAM. Disaster Recovery and Incident Response Regularly review and update the disaster recovery plan and incident response plan. Conduct annual tests and simulations to ensure readiness and identify gaps in the plans. Compliance Monitoring Monitor compliance with industry standards, including HIPAA and PCI-DSS, if applicable. Maintain documentation to support audit readiness and regulatory adherence. Performance Metrics and Reporting Develop key performance indicators (KPIs) for security practices and infrastructure performance. Provide regular reports to the CSO, CEO, and stakeholders on security program progress, risks, and metrics. IT Infrastructure Oversight Ensure the stability, scalability, and security of ThriveLink’s IT infrastructure, including telephonic AI platforms and cloud services. Collaborate with engineering teams to align IT operations with business needs. Project Management Lead cross-functional IT projects related to security, compliance, and infrastructure improvements. Ensure timely delivery of milestones and clear communication with stakeholders. Additional Skills and Qualifications Technical Expertise: Proficiency in cloud environments (AWS), secure software development practices, and vendor management tools. Regulatory Knowledge: Familiarity with HIPAA, NIST, GDPR, and other relevant security standards. Problem-Solving: Strong analytical skills to address security vulnerabilities, compliance issues, and operational inefficiencies. Communication: Ability to create clear documentation and communicate complex security concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
title: IT Product Manager (Contractor)

description: We are seeking a highly skilled CRM Integration & Automation Specialist to streamline and optimize our customer relationship management (CRM) systems. The ideal candidate will have expertise in CRM setup, integration, and automation processes to enhance efficiency, improve lead management, and maximize client engagement. Key Responsibilities: CRM Setup & Integration: Configure and integrate CRM platforms with existing tools (e.g., email marketing, sales pipelines, customer support systems). Automation: Develop workflows and automation sequences for lead nurturing, client onboarding, follow-ups, and data synchronization. Data Management: Ensure seamless data migration, organization, and maintenance for accurate reporting and analysis. Optimization: Analyze current systems to identify gaps and propose solutions to improve efficiency. Team Training: Provide training and resources to the team for effective CRM usage. Skills & Experience: Proficient in CRM platforms like HubSpot, Salesforce, Zoho, Lofty, Keeping Current Matters or similar. Strong understanding of marketing automation tools and integration (Zapier, API connections, etc.). Experience in creating custom workflows, pipelines, and reporting dashboards. Excellent problem-solving skills with a focus on scalability and usability. Strong communication skills to collaborate with teams and translate business needs into actionable CRM solutions. If you’re an experienced professional passionate about systems integration and automation, let’s connect!
title: High Level Virtual Assistant
